description: Launch link building outreach campaign to identified prospects

files.reason: Contains qualified link prospects with contact information for outreach
Identifies high-quality content assets to promote in outreach emails

data.impact: Without complete prospect data, outreach emails cannot be personalized and campaign cannot track responses
Without linkable assets identified, outreach will lack compelling content to promote

commands.name: research-link-prospects
commands.reason: Identifies and qualifies potential link prospects in target industry
commands.nextSteps: Review prospects and prioritize for outreach

commands.name: audit-content-performance
commands.reason: Identifies top-performing content suitable for link building promotion
commands.exampleOutput: Identified 12 linkable assets with high engagement and unique value
commands.nextSteps: Select assets to feature in outreach campaign
